data.text: @VMCVadodara Yes, because Covid is as selective in spread as authorities in punishing, applying only to Common Citizens. https://t.co/VwqkeHjxD7

@VMCVadodara Fines are illegal for not masking up under Disaster Management Act as per #BombayHighCourt . Collected amount needs to be returned. Yes awareness needs to be created about safety , but blackmailing with fines not done #gujarathighcourt
